task.title: Testing Sametime chat and meeting clients
task.shortdesc: This article assumes that you have successfully installed and configured Sametime or Sametime Premium.

taskbody.context: Before going live, it is important to test the following services to ensure that Sametime is working as expected.

info.p: The yourserver.domain variable is the name of your Sametime server and the domain name.

Verify if the Sametime Connect client and Sametime embedded client (in HCL Notes) are running.

substep.cmd: Add a Sametime Server Community under Preferences specifying the Host server and Server community port.
substep.info: The default Server community port value is 1533.
